title: Is it true that we have spirt animals? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sure, why not? If so, mine is the snake. I’m drawn to snakes, I’ve never feared them. I find snakes relatable. Snakes aren’t aggressive. They are shy, secretive animals. Snakes do not bite out of malice and they certainly do not go looking for enemies. They will defend their lives if/when needed. Snakes like to be left alone. Snakes have been unfairly given a bad reputation. I once saw a woman stoning a snake to death outside of church, I was a small child then and couldn’t do anything except cry.
